events.name: Syria readmitted into the Arab League
events.wd_label: Syria readmitted into the Arab League
events.wd_description: The Arab League's foreign ministers adopted a decision to readmit Syria into the league after more than a decade of suspension.
events.description: The Arab League's foreign ministers adopted a decision to readmit Syria into the league after more than a decade of suspension.

events.name: Immediate effect of readmission
events.wd_description: Syria could resume its participation in Arab League meetings with immediate effect.
events.description: Syria could resume its participation in Arab League meetings with immediate effect.

events.name: Call for resolution of Syrian crisis
events.wd_label: Call for resolution of Syrian crisis
events.wd_description: The Arab League called for a resolution of the crisis resulting from Syria’s civil war, including the flight of refugees and drug smuggling across the region.
events.description: The Arab League called for a resolution of the crisis resulting from Syria’s civil war, including the flight of refugees and drug smuggling across the region.

events.name: Formation of ministerial contact group
events.wd_description: Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Secretary General of the Arab League would form a ministerial contact group to liaise with the Syrian government and seek a steady solution to the crisis.
events.description: Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Secretary General of the Arab League would form a ministerial contact group to liaise with the Syrian government and seek a steady solution to the crisis.

events.name: Ceasefire announced between Sudanese Armed Forces and Rapid Support Forces
events.wd_label: Ceasefire announced between Sudanese Armed Forces and Rapid Support Forces
events.wd_description: The United States and Saudi Arabia announced a 24-hour ceasefire between the Sudanese Armed Forces and the Rapid Support Forces, set to start on Saturday.
events.description: The United States and Saudi Arabia announced a 24-hour ceasefire between the Sudanese Armed Forces and the Rapid Support Forces, set to start on Saturday.

events.name: Statement by Saudi Arabia's Foreign Ministry
events.wd_label: Statement by Saudi Arabia's Foreign Ministry
events.wd_description: Saudi Arabia and the US expressed frustration over the non-commitment of previous truces and announced the agreement to allow humanitarian aid movement across Sudan.
events.description: Saudi Arabia and the US expressed frustration over the non-commitment of previous truces and announced the agreement to allow humanitarian aid movement across Sudan.

events.name: Declaration of persona non grata
events.wd_description: Sudan's foreign ministry notified the United Nations that Volker Perthes, the special representative of the UN Secretary-General in Sudan, had been declared persona non grata.
events.description: Sudan's foreign ministry notified the United Nations that Volker Perthes, the special representative of the UN Secretary-General in Sudan, had been declared persona non grata.

events.name: US and EU to pledge joint action on China concerns
events.wd_label: US and EU to pledge joint action on China concerns
events.wd_description: The US and EU will pledge joint action to address concerns about China's non-market practices and coordinate export controls on semiconductors and other goods at a meeting later this month.
events.description: The US and EU will pledge joint action to address concerns about China's non-market practices and coordinate export controls on semiconductors and other goods at a meeting later this month.

events.name: Upcoming meeting details
events.wd_description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken, EU Vice-President Margarethe Vestager, and other senior officials will meet in Lulea, Sweden, on May 30-31 for the fourth edition of the EU-U.S. Trade and Technology Council (TTC).
events.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken, EU Vice-President Margarethe Vestager, and other senior officials will meet in Lulea, Sweden, on May 30-31 for the fourth edition of the EU-U.S. Trade and Technology Council (TTC).

events.name: Coordination on export controls
events.wd_description: They plan to coordinate controls on sensitive items, including goods with military use and semiconductors.
events.description: They plan to coordinate controls on sensitive items, including goods with military use and semiconductors.

events.name: Cooperation on information manipulation
events.wd_description: They aim to cooperate to counter foreign manipulation of information, including China's amplification of Russian disinformation narratives about the war in Ukraine.
events.description: They aim to cooperate to counter foreign manipulation of information, including China's amplification of Russian disinformation narratives about the war in Ukraine.

events.name: EV Battery Technology Advancements
events.wd_description: Manufacturers are evolving EV battery chemistries and technologies to address high metal prices, supply shortages, and consumer demands for increased driving range.
events.description: Manufacturers are evolving EV battery chemistries and technologies to address high metal prices, supply shortages, and consumer demands for increased driving range.

events.name: Changing Chemistries
events.wd_description: Manufacturers are adapting anode and cathode chemistries to rely on cheaper, more common elements and address high battery metal prices.
events.description: Manufacturers are adapting anode and cathode chemistries to rely on cheaper, more common elements and address high battery metal prices.

events.name: t: Diverse Cathode Chemistries
events.wd_description: EV batteries are moving toward cathode chemistries with less nickel and might employ solid-state technology in the future.
events.description: EV batteries are moving toward cathode chemistries with less nickel and might employ solid-state technology in the future.

events.name: t: Silicon-based Anodes
events.wd_description: Companies like Sila Nanotechnologies are developing silicon-based anodes to replace the graphite commonly used today.
events.description: Companies like Sila Nanotechnologies are developing silicon-based anodes to replace the graphite commonly used today.

events.name: Supply Chain Issues
events.wd_description: High demand for EVs and mineral shortages are pushing manufacturers to adopt unique chemistries and reduce reliance on a small set of countries for critical minerals.
events.description: High demand for EVs and mineral shortages are pushing manufacturers to adopt unique chemistries and reduce reliance on a small set of countries for critical minerals.

events.name: t: Concentration of Supply
events.wd_description: Concerns about dependence on a small set of countries for critical minerals like cobalt used in EV batteries.
events.description: Concerns about dependence on a small set of countries for critical minerals like cobalt used in EV batteries.

events.name: t: Rising Prices
events.wd_description: Manufacturers are responding to high battery metal prices by changing chemistries to rely on cheaper elements.
events.description: Manufacturers are responding to high battery metal prices by changing chemistries to rely on cheaper elements.

events.name: Solid-state Battery Development
events.wd_description: EV makers are exploring solid-state battery technology to improve energy density, increase battery lifespan, and reduce mineral demand.
events.description: EV makers are exploring solid-state battery technology to improve energy density, increase battery lifespan, and reduce mineral demand.

events.name: t: Solid-state Technology
events.wd_description: Solid-state batteries use a solid electrolyte rather than the liquid electrolyte in conventional cells, offering greater stability and energy density.
events.description: Solid-state batteries use a solid electrolyte rather than the liquid electrolyte in conventional cells, offering greater stability and energy density.

events.name: t: Production Challenges
events.wd_description: The primary obstacle to widespread SSB adoption is scaling up production from a lab setting to an industrial scale.
events.description: The primary obstacle to widespread SSB adoption is scaling up production from a lab setting to an industrial scale.
